text: Darling Companion is an American drama movie. The movie is about hard times in a family that has a dog. Diane Keaton plays Beth. Dianne Wiest plays Penny. This movie was shot in 2010. It was released in April 2012. The movie received bad reviews. It didn't make much money. Category:American drama movies Category:2012 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lawrence Kasdan Category:American independent movies
title: Darling Companion
